thread.title: GHOULS! StemExpress profited HOW MUCH off baby parts harvested at Planned Parenthood?!
thread.title_full: GHOULS! StemExpress profited HOW MUCH off baby parts harvested at Planned Parenthood?!

author: Sam J.
title: GHOULS! StemExpress profited HOW MUCH off baby parts harvested at Planned Parenthood?!
text:
Apparently the folks at StemExpress are looking to buy a Lamborghini of their own. 
From The Daily Signal : 
In one case, a national Planned Parenthood executive interviewed by staff investigators for the House panel said “it doesn’t bother me” that one vendor, StemExpress, paid Planned Parenthood $55 for an aborted baby’s intact brain and then sold it to a customer for more than $3,000. 
“It’s none of my concern. It doesn’t bother me,” the Planned Parenthood executive said, according to the panel’s report. 
It’s none of her concern … classy. You’d think the sale of body parts of innocents would concern people in general but apparently this is one instance of capitalism that the Lefties approve. 
Other disturbing findings from the House Panel’s Planned Parenthood findings (via The Daily Signal ): 
Several Planned Parenthood affiliates made a profit from the transfer of aborted body parts and other fetal tissue, in violation of federal law prohibiting that. 
Planned Parenthood abortion doctors would huddle with a tissue procurement technician from Novogenix to learn what aborted body parts that outside person was searching for that day. 
Planned Parenthood doctors appear to have altered their techniques to increase the chances of success in harvesting tissue from abortions that day. 
Ghouls.
